snippet: The hiring of the officer, Maj. Delrish Moss, puts a black man in charge of a mostly white department that serves a town where African-Americans make up two-thirds of the residents.
abstract: Mayor James Knowles III of Ferguson, Mo, announces hiring of Maj Delrish Moss, veteran Miami police officer, as police chief; Moss, who is black, has extensive experience dealing with news media and community leaders, and is expected to help community heal in wake of fatal shooting of Michael Brown.
lead_paragraph: The hiring of the officer, Maj. Delrish Moss, puts a black man in charge of a mostly white department that serves a town where African-Americans make up two-thirds of the residents.
